member.name: F:LingDev.Logging.File.FileWriteConfiguration.Default
member.summary:
Default configurations.
It contains:
${date:yyyyMMdd}.log for level is or .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.err.log for level is or .

member.name: F:LingDev.Logging.File.FileWriteConfiguration.All
member.summary:
All configurations.
It contains:
${date:yyyyMMdd}.trace.log for level is .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.debug.log for level is .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.infomation.log for level is .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.warning.log for level is .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.error.log for level is .
${date:yyyyMMdd}.critical.log for level is .
